atk-abh03a17:2_0: 307. Idāni parūpahārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye arahattaṁ paṭijānantānaṁ appatte
atk-abh03a17:2_1: pattasaññīnaṁ adhimānikānaṁ kuhakānaṁ vā arahattaṁ paṭijānantānaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ
atk-abh03a17:2_2: disvā ‘‘mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṁ upasaṁharantī’’ti maññanti; seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a17:2_3: pubbaseliyā ca aparaseliyā ca; te sandhāya atthi arahatoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a17:2_4: itarassa. Idāni yasmā sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hoti, tasmā atthi arahato
atk-abh03a17:2_5: rāgoti anuyogo āraddho. So sabbopi uttānatthoyeva.
atk-abh03a17:3_0: Mārakāyikā devatā attanotiādipañhe yasmā tāsaṁ devatānaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a17:3_1: aññesampi sukkaṁ gahetvā na upasaṁharanti, arahato pana sukkameva natthi, tasmā na
atk-abh03a17:4: Neva attanotipañhe pana nimminitvā upasaṁharantīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Lomakūpehītipañhe sappitelānaṁ viya lomakūpehi upasaṁharaṇābhāvaṁ disvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:5_0: 308.Handahīti vacasāyatthe nipāto. ‘‘Arahā nu kho ahaṁ, no’’ti evaṁ vimatiṁ gāhayissāmāti
atk-abh03a17:5_1: evaṁ vacasāyaṁ katvā upasaṁharantīti attho. Atthi arahato vimatīti puṭṭho aṭṭhavatthukaṁ
atk-abh03a17:5_2: vicikicchaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, dutiyaṁ puṭṭho itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottādīsu sanniṭṭhānābhāvaṁ
atk-abh03a17:6: 309.Atthi tassa āsayoti tassa sukkassa uccārapassāvānaṁ viya patiṭṭhānokāso atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a17:7_1: vadati. Paradhammakusalassāti sadhammato parasmiṁ aṭṭhasamāpattidhammepi kusalassa.
atk-abh03a17:7_2: Ubhatobhāgavimuttaṁ sandhāyevaṁ vadati. Sesamettha pāḷianusāreneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a17:10_0: 314. Idāni aññāṇaṁ, kaṅkhā, paravitaraṇāti tisso kathā nāma honti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘arahato
atk-abh03a17:10_1: itthipurisādīnaṁ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi aññāṇaṁ, tattheva sanniṭṭhānābhāvena
atk-abh03a17:10_2: atthi kaṅkhā. Yasmā ca nesaṁ tāni vatthūni pare vitaranti pakāsenti ācikkhanti, tasmā
atk-abh03a17:10_3: nesaṁ atthi paravitaraṇā’’ti imā laddhiyo, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṁ; tesaṁ
atk-abh03a17:10_4: tā laddhiyo bhindituṁ tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca
atk-abh03a17:10_5: itarassa. Tattha sabbesupi pañhesu ceva vissajjanesu ca pāḷiṁ anugantvāva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a17:13_0: 326. Idāni vacībhedakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe paṭhamaṁ
atk-abh03a17:13_1: jhānaṁ samāpannassa dukkhanti vācā bhijjatī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṁ;
atk-abh03a17:13_2: te sandhāya samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṁ ṭhatvā paṭiññā
atk-abh03a17:13_3: paravādissa. Puna sabbatthāti tayo bhave sandhāya puṭṭho arūpaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:13_4: Sabbadāti kālavasena puṭṭho paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe paṭhamajjhānikasamāpattito aññaṁ sabbaṁ
atk-abh03a17:13_5: samāpattikālaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Sabbesaṁ samāpannānanti puṭṭho lokiyasamāpattiyo
atk-abh03a17:13_6: samāpanne sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Sabbasamāpattīsūti puṭṭho dutiyajjhānādikaṁ lokuttaraṁ
atk-abh03a17:14_0: Kāyabhedoti abhikkamādivasena pavattakāyaviññatti. Idaṁ ‘‘yāni cittāni vacīviññattiṁ
atk-abh03a17:14_1: samuṭṭhāpenti, tāneva kāyaviññattiṁ. Evaṁ sante kasmā kāyabhedopi na hotī’’ti codanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a17:14_2: pucchati. Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Idāni yadi so maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a17:14_3: ‘‘dukkha’’nti vācaṁ bhāsati, ‘‘samudayo’’tiādikampi bhāseyya. Yadi vā taṁ na bhāsati,
atk-abh03a17:14_4: itarampi na bhāseyyāti codanatthaṁ dukkhanti jānantotiādayo pañhā vuttā. Itaro pana
atk-abh03a17:14_5: attano laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca. Lokuttaraṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ
atk-abh03a17:15: 328.Ñāṇanti lokuttaraṁ catusaccañāṇaṁ. Sotanti sotaviññāṇaṁ adhippetaṁ, yena taṁ saddaṁ suṇāti. Dvinnaṁ phassānanti sotasamphassamanosamphassānaṁ.
atk-abh03a17:16_0: 329.No vata re vattabbeti yadi avisesena yaṁkiñci samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo,
atk-abh03a17:16_1: na avisesena vattabbaṁ ‘‘samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo’’ti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva
atk-abh03a17:16_2: saddhiṁ suttasādhanāya. Yaṁ panetena ‘‘sikhissa ānanda, bhagavato’’ti pariyosāne
atk-abh03a17:16_3: suttaṁ ābhataṁ, tattha yena samāpatticittena so vacībhedo samuṭṭhito, kāyabhedopi
atk-abh03a17:16_4: tena samuṭṭhātiyeva, na ca taṁ lokuttaraṁ paṭhamajjhānacittaṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a17:19_0: 334. Idāni dukkhāhārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘dukkhaṁ dukkhanti vācaṁ bhāsanto dukkhe
atk-abh03a17:19_1: ñāṇaṁ āharati, taṁ dukkhāhāro nāma vuccati . Tañca panetaṁ maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpanna’’nti
atk-abh03a17:19_2: yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyānaṁ; te sandhāya dukkhāhāroti pucchā
atk-abh03a17:19_3: sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Ye kecīti paṭhamapañhe avipassake sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a17:19_4: dutiyapañhe vipassake sandhāya paṭijānāti, taṁ panassa laddhimattameva. Tasmā ‘‘sabbe
atk-abh03a17:19_5: te’’ti vādassa bhindanatthaṁ bālaputhujjanātiādimāha. Taṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a17:22_0: 335. Idāni cittaṭṭhitikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ samāpatticittañceva bhavaṅgacittañca
atk-abh03a17:22_1: anuppabandhena pavattamānaṁ disvā ‘‘ekameva cittaṁ ciraṁ tiṭṭhatī’’ti laddhi seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a17:22_2: etarahi heṭṭhā vuttappabhedānaṁ andhakānaṁ, taṁladdhivisodhanatthaṁ ekaṁ, cittaṁ
atk-abh03a17:22_3: divasaṁ tiṭṭhatīti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Upaḍḍhadivaso uppādakkhaṇoti
atk-abh03a17:22_4: ettha ṭhitikkhaṇaṁ anāmasitvā ‘‘aniccā vata saṅkhārā, uppādavayadhammino’’ti (saṁ.
atk-abh03a17:23_0: Te dhammā cittena lahuparivattāti puṭṭho cittato lahutaraparivattino dhamme apassanto
atk-abh03a17:23_1: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yassa cittassa dīghaṭṭhitiṁ icchati, taṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:23_2: Yāvatāyukaṁ tiṭṭhatīti pañhe ‘‘cullāsītisahassāni, kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū’’tiādivacanavasena
atk-abh03a17:23_3: (mahāni. 10) āruppato aññatra paṭikkhipati, āruppe paṭijānāti. Muhuttaṁ muhuttaṁ
atk-abh03a17:23_5: Ṭhitiṁ panassa laddhivasena icchati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a17:26_0: 338. Idāni kukkuḷakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, ādittaṁ (saṁ.
atk-abh03a17:26_1: ni. 4.28; mahāva. 54) sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā’’tiādīni (dha. pa. 278) suttāni ayoniso
atk-abh03a17:26_2: gahetvā ‘‘nippariyāyeneva sabbe saṅkhārā kukkuḷā vītaccitaṅgārasammissā chārikanirayasadisā’’ti
atk-abh03a17:26_3: laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi gokulikānaṁ; tesaṁ nānappakārasukhasandassanena taṁ laddhiṁ
atk-abh03a17:26_4: vivecetuṁ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Tattha anodhiṁ katvāti odhiṁ mariyādaṁ
atk-abh03a17:26_5: koṭṭhāsaṁ akaritvā, avisesena sabbeyevāti attho. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṁ
atk-abh03a17:29: 339. Idāni anupubbābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ –
atk-abh03a17:32_0: Ādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno ekacce kilese
atk-abh03a17:32_1: dukkhadassanena pajahati, ekacce samudayanirodhamaggadassanena, tathā sesāpīti evaṁ
atk-abh03a17:32_2: soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi anupubbena kilesappahānaṁ katvā arahattapaṭilābho hotī’’ti evarūpā
atk-abh03a17:32_4: tesaṁ laddhivivecanatthaṁ anupubbābhisamayoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a17:32_5: Anupubbena sotāpattimagganti puṭṭho pana ekassa maggassa bahubhāvāpattibhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:32_6: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho dukkhadassanādivasena paṭijānāti. Tāni vā cattāripi ñāṇāni eko sotāpattimaggoyevāti
atk-abh03a17:32_7: paṭijānāti, phalaṁ pana ekameva icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Sakadāgāmimaggādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a17:33_0: 344.Magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti pañhe yasmā dukkhadassanādīhi dassanaṁ apariniṭṭhitaṁ,
atk-abh03a17:33_1: maggadassanena pariniṭṭhitaṁ nāma hoti, tadā so phale ṭhitoti saṅkhaṁ gacchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:34_0: 345.Dukkhediṭṭhe cattāri saccānīti pucchā paravādissa, ekābhisamayavasena paṭiññā
atk-abh03a17:34_1: sakavādissa. Puna dukkhasaccaṁ cattāri saccānīti anuyoge catunnampi nānāsabhāvattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a17:35_0: Rūpakkhandhe aniccato diṭṭheti pucchā sakavādissa, samuddato ekabindussa rase paṭividdhe
atk-abh03a17:35_1: sesaudakassa paṭivedho viya ekadhamme aniccādito paṭividdhe sabbepi paṭividdhā hontīti
atk-abh03a17:36_0: Catūhi ñāṇehīti dukkhe ñāṇādīhi. Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehīti sāvakānaṁ sādhāraṇehi saccañāṇehi
atk-abh03a17:36_1: ceva paṭisambhidāñāṇehi ca. Dvādasahi ñāṇehīti dvādasaṅgapaṭiccasamuppādañāṇehi.
atk-abh03a17:36_2: Catucattārīsāya ñāṇehīti ‘‘jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṁ, jarāmaraṇasamudaye ñāṇa’’nti evaṁ nidānavagge
atk-abh03a17:36_3: vuttañāṇehi. Sattasattatiyā ñāṇehīti ‘‘jarāmaraṇaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ
atk-abh03a17:36_5: ni. 2.20) evaṁ tattheva vuttañāṇehi. Sesamettha pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṁ saddhiṁ suttasādhanenāti.
atk-abh03a17:39_0: 347. Idāni vohārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha buddho bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena voharatīti
atk-abh03a17:39_1: yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena
atk-abh03a17:39_2: paṭiññā paravādissa. Lokuttare sotetiādīni tassa ayuttavādībhāvadīpanatthaṁ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a17:39_3: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – ‘‘saddāyatanameva te lokuttaraṁ, udāhu sotādīnipī’’ti.
atk-abh03a17:40_0: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti ettha yadi so lokuttare
atk-abh03a17:40_1: paṭihaññeyya. Lokuttaro siyāti evamattho na gahetabbo. Lokiye paṭihaññamānassa pana
atk-abh03a17:40_2: lokuttaratā nāma natthīti ayametthādhippāyo. Lokiyena viññāṇenāti etthāpi lokiyenevāti
atk-abh03a17:40_3: attho. Itarathā anekantatā siyā. Lokuttarañhi lokiyenapi ñāṇena ñāyatī. Evaṁ sabbaṁ
atk-abh03a17:40_4: yathānurūpato veditabbaṁ. Sabbe te maggaṁ bhāventīti pañhesu ye maggaṁ nappaṭilabhanti,
atk-abh03a17:40_5: te sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Ye paṭilabhanti, te sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:42: Eḷaṇḍiyāyāti eḷaṇḍamayāya. Idaṁ sakavādissa udāharaṇaṁ. Lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyoti ayampi ekā laddhi. Sā etarahi ekaccānaṁ andhakānaṁ laddhi. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a17:45_0: 353. Idāni nirodhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ appaṭisaṅkhānirodhañca paṭisaṅkhānirodhañca
atk-abh03a17:45_1: dvepi ekato katvā nirodhasaccanti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi mahisāsakānañceva andhakānañca;
atk-abh03a17:45_2: te sandhāya dve nirodhāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa . Dve dukkhanirodhāti
atk-abh03a17:45_3: pañhesu yasmā dve dukkhasaccāni na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Yasmā dvīhākārehi
atk-abh03a17:45_4: dukkhaṁ nirujjhatīti icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti. Dve nirodhasaccānītipañhesu dvinnaṁ
atk-abh03a17:45_5: dukkhasaccānaṁ nirodhavasenaanicchanto paṭikkhipati. Dvīhākārehi dukkhassa nirujjhanato
atk-abh03a17:46: Atthi dvinnaṁ nibbānānantiādīsu pucchāsu uccanīcatādīni apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:47_0: Appaṭisaṅkhāniruddheti ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhā suddhapakatikattā
atk-abh03a17:47_1: vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṁ vā vasena na samudācaraṇato niruddhāti vuccanti, te saṅkhāre.
atk-abh03a17:47_2: Paṭisaṅkhā nirodhentīti. Lokuttarañāṇena nirodhenti anuppattibhāvaṁ gamenti. Nanu
atk-abh03a17:47_3: appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhā saṅkhārāti pucchā paravādissa . Tattha bhaggānaṁ puna abhañjanato
atk-abh03a17:47_4: appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhānaṁ vā ariyamagge uppanne tathā nirujjhanatova sakavādī accantabhaggataṁ
